unnormalised: India beat Pakistan in the T20 World Cup yesterday! What a match! The final score was India 160/6 and Pakistan 159/8. It went down to the wire, with India needing 15 runs off the last 6 balls. Hardik Pandya hit a six on the 5th ball of the over to seal the deal.
normalised: India beat Pakistan in the T-two-zero World Cup yesterday! What a match! The final score was India one hundred and sixty divided by six and Pakistan one hundred and fifty nine divided by eight. It went down to the wire, with India needing fifteen runs off the last six balls. Hardik Pandya hit a six on the fifth ball of the over to seal the deal.

unnormalised: Earlier in the day, Virat Kohli scored a brilliant 82 runs off 53 balls, earning him the Man of the Match award. Babar Azam, the Pakistan captain, scored 52 runs. The highest wicket taker was Shaheen Afridi with 3 wickets. The match attendance was recorded at 90,293.
normalised: Earlier in the day, Virat Kohli scored a brilliant eighty two runs off fifty three balls, earning him the Man of the Match award. Babar Azam, the Pakistan captain, scored fifty two runs. The highest wicket taker was Shaheen Afridi with three wickets. The match attendance was recorded at ninety thousand two hundred and ninety three.

unnormalised: Next up, India plays South Africa on 27/10/2024. Let's hope they can keep the winning streak going! It's gonna be another nail-biter for sure. The odds are currently 1.75 for India to win and 2.05 for South Africa.
normalised: Next up, India plays South Africa on twenty seventh October two thousand and twenty four. Let's hope they can keep the winning streak going! It's gonna be another nail-biter for sure. The odds are currently one point seven five for India to win and two point zero five for South Africa.
